title: Curse the Gods, Obliterate the Heavens - Novel Updates
tags: Dragons   Male Protagonist   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Weak to Strong
author: Jump God 3   跳神3
description:
A youth burdened with a mysterious mission, able to traverse between the heaven and earth. 

Whether it is a cold – blooded killer, the dethroned princess of a vanquished nation, or the innumerable types of beautiful girls, they all have to bow down to his purity. 

Finally writing a mystical song of adoration and praise.>
